title: Jayakrishna Konda - Professional Profile
content:
Jayakrishna Konda is a Machine Learning Engineer and Full-stack Developer with a strong focus on AI/ML systems and infrastructure.

Professional Background:
- Currently pursuing advanced studies in Machine Learning and AI
- Specializes in building RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) systems
- Experienced in both research and production ML deployments
- Active contributor to open-source projects
- Public speaker on data storage technologies

Core Competencies:
- AI/ML: TensorFlow, PyTorch, LangChain, NLP, Computer Vision, MLOps
- Full-stack: React, Next.js, TypeScript, Python, Django, Node.js
- DevOps: Docker, Kubernetes, Linux, AWS, GCP, CI/CD
- Specialized: Android ROM development, Custom Kernels, Home server management
